definition: tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten
heel/to follow closely/to go with/(of a woman) to marry sb/with/compared with/to/towards/and (joining two nouns)

sentences.english: It also reflects the pantheistic experimentation of the period immediately following the Civil War.
sentences.chinese: 同時也反映出了泛神論時期緊跟的內戰時期狀態。

sentences.english: Longtze remained in contact but rounded the windward mark in last position.
sentences.chinese: 龍之子號一路緊跟但還是最後一個繞標。

sentences.english: He heeled after his wife as a dog.
sentences.chinese: 他像狗一樣緊跟在他妻子的身後。

sentences.english: A full error message follows, running to the end of the format string.
sentences.chinese: 緊跟一個完整的錯誤信息，直到格式串尾。

sentences.english: The students walked through the gates with Uncle Wang (L34).
sentences.chinese: 同學們緊跟王伯伯走進廠門。

sentences.english: But research will follow the market.
sentences.chinese: 但是，研究將緊跟市場步伐。

sentences.english: The car pelted along,with two motorcycles running after.
sentences.chinese: 那輛汽車急速行駛，兩輛摩托車緊跟其後。

sentences.english: In any industry ,you have to stay current on new trends and technologies .
sentences.chinese: 在任何一個行業裏，你必須緊跟新技術和發展的潮流。

sentences.english: He described Yang as "very meek and very nervous."
sentences.chinese: 他形容楊欣“緊跟其後，非常緊張”。

sentences.english: Once one of them followed me until I gave him a dollar.
sentences.chinese: 有一次一個人緊跟我不放直到我給了他一塊錢才走。

sentences.english: After a bright flash, there came a very loudly thunder.
sentences.chinese: 一個閃電過後，緊跟的是咔嚓嚓的雷聲。

sentences.english: Firms also use fancy job titles to signal that they are au fait with the latest fashion.
sentences.chinese: 各家公司用花哨的職位來表示他們緊跟時尚潮流。

sentences.english: South Korea's Seoul ranked third, followed closely by Tokyo at No. 4.
sentences.chinese: 韓國的首爾名列第三，東京緊跟其後，位居第四。

sentences.english: Others have followed in Apple’s footsteps.
sentences.chinese: 其他人也已經緊跟蘋果的步伐。

sentences.english: I wish the person behind us could stop tailgating us.
sentences.chinese: 真希望我們後面那個人可以不要再緊跟我們。

sentences.english: The blog is updated relatively frequent and it is a good resource to monitor.
sentences.chinese: 這個博客更新很勤，也是一個可以緊跟的好資源。
